name: Calamidad Dorada
description:
In Calamidad Dorada you play as a spanish shipcrew returning to Spain from their endeavors.

Under their stolen treasures is a cursed Artifact. You as the player need to find out, which artefact is the cursed one to bring your party safely back to their home port. 

This game has been developed  by the student team Unemployed Crunchers

Check out our website: https://www.calamidaddorada.school4games.net/
